articles.description: Follow action from Sunday's four games in the Premier League including Fulham v Arsenal and Spurs v Chelsea.
articles.title: Premier League LIVE: Four games including Fulham v Arsenal, Ipswich v Bournemouth, Leicester v Brighton, Spurs v Chelsea - radio & text

articles.description: West Ham striker Michail Antonio has surgery on a lower limb fracture, the club announces.
articles.title: Michail Antonio: West Ham striker has surgery on lower limb fracture

articles.description: Lando Norris secures McLaren's first Formula 1 constructors' championship for 26 years with victory in the season-ending Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lando Norris wins Abu Dhabi Grand Prix for McLaren to seal constructors' title

articles.description: Champions Cup: Follow live text commentary & BBC radio commentaries as Bordeaux Begles take on Leicester Tigers, Champions Toulouse play Ulster, Bristol Bears host Leinster.
articles.title: Champions Cup & European Challenge Cup LIVE: Bordeaux Begles v Leicester Tigers, Toulouse v Ulster, Bristol Bears v Leinster, Pau v Newcastle Falcons - scores and commentary

articles.description: Arsenal have a late goal disallowed as they miss the chance to close the gap on Premier League leaders Liverpool to four points with a draw against Fulham at Craven Cottage.
articles.title: Fulham 1-1 Arsenal: Gunners held after late Bukayo Saka winner disallowed

articles.description: Jacob Bethell has proved he belongs in international cricket with his runs against New Zealand, according to England captain Ben Stokes.
articles.title: New Zealand v England: Jacob Bethell proved he belongs, says Ben Stokes

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from West Bromwich Albion v Sheffield United in the Championship.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: West Bromwich Albion v Sheffield United: stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: Leicester produce a stunning comeback to maintain Ruud van Nistelrooy's unbeaten start in an enthralling draw with Brighton.
articles.title: Leicester City 2-2 Brighton: Jamie Vardy inspires late fightback for hosts

articles.description: Leicester Tigers see half-time lead overturned by impressive Bordeaux Begles but earn bonus point with late try despite 42-28 Investec Champions Cup defeat in France.
articles.title: Bordeaux Begles 42-28 Leicester Tigers: Bonus point defeat for Tigers in Investec Champions Cup opener

articles.description: India captain Rohit Sharma says the manner of his side's second-Test thrashing by Australia will not leave his players with mental scars.
articles.title: Rohit Sharma: India's players not scarred by Australia thrashing
